General.Name: Italy Innovazioni SpA
General.Description: Italy Innovazioni S.p.A. operates an intellectual property business company, engages in the design, prototyping, production, and marketing of electric outlets in Italy and internationally. The company offers Hide, a recessed electrical outlet. Italy Innovazioni S.p.A. was founded in 2012 and is based in Rome, Italy.
General.Address: Corso Di Porta Vittoria No. 13, Milan, MI, Italy, 20122
